title.rendered: Get in the Hearing Loop Resources

content.rendered:
Resources for Chapters and Advocates

Do you need help advocating for hearing loops?
This online resource offers free downloadable tools to help you advocate for assistive listening systems via hearing loops in your community. Whether you want to learn how a hearing loop works, more about providing ADA-mandated communication access, or need a poster for your loop presentation, this toolkit has resources to guide you every step of the way.
